description: Update a workload or custom lens share invitation.

parameters.name: ShareInvitationId
parameters.description: The ID assigned to the share invitation.

parameters.name: ShareInvitationAction
parameters.description: Share invitation action taken by contributor.

nested_items.name: ShareInvitation
nested_items.description: The updated workload or custom lens share invitation.

nested_items.name: ShareInvitationId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the share invitation.

nested_items.name: ShareResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the share invitation.

nested_items.name: WorkloadId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the workload. This ID is unique within an Amazon Web Services Region.
